articlesDesc: Below are some of the highlights.

onBoarding.step1Description: To get started, please select the role that best describes you. This choice will allow us to personalize your experience and request the specific information we need to create your account.
onBoarding.step1CompanyDescription: Promote your brand, share your products, and showcase your new releases.
onBoarding.step1MusicBandDescription: Promote your music, reach a wider audience, and manage your event logistics.
onBoarding.step2Band: STEP 2 of 2: Enter Your Band Details
onBoarding.step2Company: STEP 2 of 2: Enter Your Company Details
onBoarding.step2BandDescription: Please complete the form below with your band's details to finish setting up your account.
onBoarding.step2CompanyDescription: Please complete the form below with your company's details to finish setting up your account.
